Definition: In this task, choose one option that correctly answers the given question

Positive Examples.input:
What English Premier League soccer team did David Beckham play for in 2002?
Option A: Manchester United
Option B: Victoria Beckham
Option C: Spice Girls
Option D: Best MLS Player ESPY Award
Positive Examples.explanation: David Beckham played for Manchester United in 2002

Positive Examples.input:
Whom did Patrick Steward play in the series "Star Trek"?
Option A: Jean-Luc Picard
Option B: commanding officer
Option C: Yes
Option D: David Birkin
Positive Examples.explanation: Patrick Steward played Jean-Luc Picard in the series "Star Trek"

Option D: Agent Smith
Negative Examples.explanation: Lilly Wachowski and Lana Wachowski directed The Matrix
